name: The Duel (BlackArmada)
description:
The Duel is a two-player game about two close friends who fall out and have a duel. Will their friendship survive? Will they?

The Duel was a finalist in David Schirduan’s 200-word RPG challenge 2015.

The image is an artistic impression of the Burr-Hamilton duel in 1804. They were not friends, but it's a nice picture.
